function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Neoliberal surveillance mechanism through big data","category":"Privacy","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of covid-19 transmission in the workplace due to close interaction among workforce, design team, contractors, clients, stakeholders, and supply chain.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of cross-sector collaboration","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of crisis management skills","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of crisis-response leadership programs","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unanimous implementation of solutions not achieved in organisations a and c","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited availability of virus testing for workers within the uk","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of covid-19 from suppliers delivering materials to construction sites.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing in site offices and vans","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of new staff into the organization may pose a risk of disease transmission if proper onboarding protocols are not in place","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited availability of graduate student volunteers","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Geographical concentration of covid-19 occupational safety research in specific regions such as europe, central asia, and north america.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of resources for implementing exhaustive measures in low-income developing countries","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low employee positivity rates from asymptomatic testing","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heterogeneity in covid-19 positivity based on study region","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regulación del teletrabajo a nivel mundial","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Propagación acelerada del virus debido a la falta de aislamiento social en países afectados inicialmente.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"}]}
